mapper.select: select Bus_Id,Bus_StartPoint,Bus_AimPoint ,Bus_SeatMeasage,Bus_ModifyTime,Bus_StartTime ,Bus_MidStation from tbl_bus where bus_type = 0 and Bus_StartTime like concat(#{startDate},'%');
select max(Bus_ModifyTime) from tbl_bus where Bus_Type = 1;
select Bus_Id,Bus_StartPoint,Bus_AimPoint ,Bus_SeatMeasage,Bus_ModifyTime,Bus_StartTime ,Bus_MidStation from tbl_bus where bus_type = 1 and Bus_ModifyTime like concat(#{modifyDate},'%');

select Bus_Id,Bus_StartPoint,Bus_AimPoint ,Bus_SeatMeasage,Bus_ModifyTime,Bus_StartTime ,Bus_MidStation from tbl_bus where bus_type = 0 and Bus_StartPoint = #{startPoint} and Bus_AimPoint = #{aimPoint} order by Bus_StartTime desc limit 0,30;
select News_Id,News_Title,News_Url,News_PubTime from tbl_news where News_Type = 15 order by News_PubTime desc limit #{start},#{num};
select Bus_Id,Bus_StartPoint,Bus_AimPoint,Bus_SeatMeasage ,Bus_ModifyTime,Bus_StartTime,Bus_MidStation,Bus_Charger from tbl_bus where Bus_Type = 0 order by Bus_ModifyTime desc limit #{start},#{num};
select Bus_Id,Bus_StartPoint,Bus_AimPoint,Bus_SeatMeasage ,Bus_ModifyTime,Bus_StartTime,Bus_MidStation,Bus_Charger from tbl_bus where Bus_Type = 1 order by Bus_ModifyTime desc limit #{start},#{num};
